subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Ocean Voyages
lead_paragraph: This year’s race includes a record 30 competitors, and for the first time the world’s top solo ocean-racing sailors will be on the 26,000-nautical-mile course together.
snippet: This year’s race includes a record 30 competitors, and for the first time the world’s top solo ocean-racing sailors will be on the 26,000-nautical-mile course together.
